articles.author: Rick Noack, Rachel Chason
articles.title: ECOWAS mobilizes reserve force as Niger crisis remains unsolved - The Washington Post
articles.description: West African governments struggled to chart a clear path out of the crisis in Niger during an emergency summit on Thursday.

articles.title: Finally, someone said it: AB de Villiers thrilled as Harsha Bhogle plays down Tilak Varma 49 controversy - India Today
articles.description: West Indies vs India: Legendary South Africa batter AB de Villiers backed Harsha Bhogle's take on prioritising milestones in T20I cricket after Hardik Pandya faced flak for hitting a winning six in a T20I in Guyana that denied Tilak Varma an opportunity to co…
